## R Markdown


```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
url <-"https://www.usnews.com/best-colleges/rankings/national-universities"
college_tab <- url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_node(".table") %>%
  html_table()%>%
  magrittr::set_colnames(c("rank", "flare_classification", "date", "flare_region",  "start_time", "maximum_time", "end_time", "movie"))
as_tibble(flares_tab)

```
